title.ipSuccessfullyRetrieved:
Now you can update the AWS Security Group to allow your IP to access Datapar's features.

What do you want to do?
title.notLogged: Let's start by logging in with your Datapar Gmail credentials. You'll be redirected to Google's authentication page.

home.title: AWS Security Group Modifier
home.title.three: Here you can add or update your IP address to the Datapar security group.
home.title.two: A simple tool to help you manage our AWS Security Groups.
